manual.title: Manual configuration
manual.description:
Sorry, we don't know this device: {name} ({type} at {host}). You can try to configure it manually by selecting an appropriate device class.

If you manage to make it work, please consider opening an issue or creating a pull request in the [python-broadlink]({url}) library.

reset.title: Unlock the device
reset.description:
{name} ({model} at {host}) is locked. You need to unlock the device in order to authenticate and complete the configuration. Instructions:
1. Open the Broadlink app.
2. Click on the device.
3. Click `...` in the upper right.
4. Scroll to the bottom of the page.
5. Disable the lock.

unlock.title: Unlock the device (optional)
unlock.description: {name} ({model} at {host}) is locked. This can lead to authentication problems in Home Assistant. Would you like to unlock it?
